title: typographic matchmaking book
content:
hi people,

just bought the typographic matchmaking book so i'm pointing this question to the people here whom own this book also...when going trough the fonts on the disk i noticed that 'TheMix Arabic" folder only contains 0kb TTF files, so they can't be opened, only thing that works in that folder is the readme pdf file.

shouldn't this font normaly be included and working?....just asking to make sure :)

the book looks superb, can't wait to start reading!!
author: omar

comments.content: Where did you buy this book? I've not heard of it.

i bought it in an art and architecture bookshop in Antwerp (Belgium) actually i had the book ordered and they contacted me yesterday that it came in so i got it today...came home checked the CD but as i said the "TheMix" ttf file doesn't work its 2 0Kb files...all the other fonts work.
